pkgmetadata.longdescription: Meta package for standard joetoo setup on a single board computer (sbc) Optionally uses dev-embedded/joetoo-meta::joetoo Boot firmware installation (via boot-fw) and kernel (via kernel_image) is functional for Rasberry Pi boards, but it is still evolving for rockchip boards (as of June 2024). That may also be moved in the future, to a package that installs the kernel kernel, modules, firmware, device tree, bootloader, etc.

use.flag: Tailor for Raspberry Pi model B (armv6/32)
Tailor for Raspberry Pi 3 B v1.2 (armv7/32)
Tailor for Raspberry Pi 3 B Plus (armv8/64)
Install boot config files and baseline packages
Install joetoo-meta package and its dependencies
Install raspi or rockchip bootloader, boot firmware
